name: Free 3D Lettering Pack
description:
This free set of 3D letters includes 15 quotes in 5 different 3D styles in 4k resolution PNG files with transparent backgrounds.


Highly detailed 3D lettering design, ideal for use in large compositions, printed items or digital media.


The 3D typography and pre-made quotes are available in 5 different design styles with unique color palettes.


Featured


  • 5 3D lettering quotes
  • 5 trendy color palettes
  • High resolution
  • Transparent PNG files
  • Personal use license


The full pack includes a 3D lettering set with 260+ quotes, numbers and letters - 5 different 3D styles in 4k resolution PNG files with transparent backgrounds and you can buy it at


Check out the Creative Toolkit, the largest design resource pack.
